name: Being Beauteous
description:
Being Beauteous is a short kinetic novel that reinvents the overly known story of Cinderella by throwing in a surprising element that disrupts the traditional fairytale in a bittersweet manner.

(Originally created in less than a week for a French game jam)


  • Writing / Project Leader: Helia
  • Cover Art: Melow
  • Illustrations: Orties
  • Music: Roganis
  • Programming: Keul
  • GUI: Xian
